name: Bounce 2
description:
You made it! Finally you managed to escape the factory and for the first time in your life you are able to breathe the fresh air of nature...

Explore your surroundings and make your way through the parkour!

But be carefull: your slimy body seems to dissolve in water...

Credits

Game Art / Programming by: Me 

Music by: David Renda

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe. Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Game-A-Week"  (WinterSemester 2020/21)
